GSD.description:
iommu/arm-smmu-v3: fix event handling soft lockup

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.34 by commit 99073052f45be3b4543f87547e94dfe04bf56f39. For more details please see the references link.
